Html:
I wanna traverse the  whole DOM tree to get a preorder tags string, but when meet the <form> tag, it's OuterHtml is "<form>", not "<form>...</form>"

could anyone help me?  Thanks!
Can you post the html sample of what you were trying to parse?

I have fixed it by removing "ElementsFlags.Add("form", HtmlElementFlag.CanOverlap | HtmlElementFlag.Empty);" from HtmlNode.cs
Thanks a lot.
